fields.name: Galway Roast Ground Coffee 200gr
fields.description: Galway Roast 3 Bean Blend Ground Coffee, a true masterpiece crafted with utmost care. This renowned blend comprises 100% premium Arabica beans sourced from the lush regions of Brazil, Guatemala, and Honduras

fields.name: Galway Roast Whole bean Coffee 200gr
fields.description: The Galway Roast whole bean coffee has become renowned for its consistent quality and distinctive flavor since its creation in 2008. This famous three-bean blend has remained unchanged over the years, a testament to its exceptional taste and popularity among coffee lovers.

fields.name: Bean West Bolivia Ground 200gr
fields.description: A family run boutique, this coffee ground is certified organic with hints of Chocolate, Hazelnut, Grape and Orange

fields.name: Bean West Congo Ground 200gr
fields.description: A family run boutique, this coffee ground is amazingly clean, sweet and fruity with aromas like cranberry, dried fig, peach and caramel

fields.name: Bean West Decaf 200gr
fields.description: A family run boutique, this coffee ground is Swiss Water process decaffeinated coffee. Beans are decaffeinated using high pressure mountain water washing out 99.9% of the caffeine.

fields.name: Bialetti Rainbow Brewer
fields.description: The Bialetti Rainbow Brewer produces a rich, authentic espresso in just minutes. The aluminium pot features Bialettiâ€™s distinctive eight-sided shape that allows it to diffuse heat perfectly to enhance the aroma of your coffee

fields.name: Bodum - Java French Press 3 Cup
fields.description: The Java french press can make upt o 3 cups of fresh brewed coffee
